Hotel.name: Millennium Broadway New York Times Square

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Millennium Broadway Hotel - Times Square places you in the heart of New York, steps from Broadway and Times Square. This 4-star hotel is close to Rockefeller Center and Macy's.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 626 air-conditioned guestrooms. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services. Additional amenities include gift shops/newsstands, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services. Additional amenities include gift shops/newsstands, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

The nearest airports are:

New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 17.8 km / 11.1 mi

The preferred airport for Millennium Broadway Hotel - Times Square is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Millennium Broadway Hotel - Times Square are:
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 17.8 km / 11.1 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 21.1 km / 13.1 mi

The preferred airport for Millennium Broadway Hotel - Times Square is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. For all reservations of 5 nights or more, once the Guest has checked in, early check out will require at least 72 hours’ prior notice (failing which there will be an early departure charge equivalent to 3 nights’ full accommodation charge for the room booked). For example, for a 5 night stay the earliest the Guest can check out is day 3 or otherwise s/he shall incur the early departure charge.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 26-30 USD per room per day to be paid directly to the hotel. Applicable from 01/Apr/2019 to 31/Mar/2020

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 26-30 USD per room per day to be paid directly to the hotel. Applicable from 01/Apr/2019 to 31/Mar/2020

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Please note: For any bookings for travel dates April 1, 2019 and after, a mandatory facility fee of $28.69USD per room per night will apply. It is payable on the spot unless the room type with facility fee inclusive. Facility fee includes: Premium High Speed Internet Access, Complimentary local, long-distance, and international calls , Access to Club fitness facility, Discount tickets at tour attractions. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room 1

Notice
The Client is advised that check-in time into the Hotel begins at 3:00pm local time. Check-out time is 11:00am local time. Late departures up to 6:00pm are possible, subject to availability, though additional charges may be imposed by the Hotel. Day use room requirements should be requested at time of reservation.


Paid by guest upon check out.


Effective on April 1, 2019 a facility fee of $28.69 will be paid locally to the hotel and is mandatory


Please note that the hotel requires the lead guest/booking holder to be 21 years old or older in order to make a booking with them. Please note, only the lead guest needs to be over 21. The hotel accepts all ages for other guests.
